description: Query a list of log entries for deleted objects.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: CLASS of the object, e. g. DOMAIN
ID of a object, e. g. domainname.com
Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned. The system has a default value for performance purposes
Min date of the log entry
Max date of the log entry
Parameter by which the output will be ordered.Must be one of the following:OBJECTID, OBJECTIDDESC, OBJECTCLASS, OBJECTCLASSDESC, LOGDATE, LOGDATEDESC
paramaters.Type: OBJECTID, OBJECTIDDESC, OBJECTCLASS, OBJECTCLASSDESC, LOGDATE, LOGDATEDESC or NULL
